com.opengamma.strata.engine.marketdata

Class DefaultMarketDataFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opengamma.strata.engine.marketdata.DefaultMarketDataFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MarketDataFactory

    public final class DefaultMarketDataFactory
extends Object
implements MarketDataFactory
    Co-ordinates building of market data.

    • Method Detail

      • buildBaseMarketData

        public BaseMarketDataResult buildBaseMarketData(MarketDataRequirements requirements,
                                                BaseMarketData suppliedData,
                                                MarketDataConfig marketDataConfig)
        Description copied from interface: MarketDataFactory
        Builds the market data required for performing calculations over a portfolio.

        If the calculations require any data not provided in the suppliedData it is built by the engine.

        Specified by:
        buildBaseMarketData in interface MarketDataFactory
        Parameters:
        requirements - the market data required for the calculations
        suppliedData - market data supplied by the caller
        marketDataConfig - configuration needed to build non-observable market data, for example curves or surfaces
        Returns:
        the market data required by the calculations plus details of any data that could not be built

      • buildScenarioMarketData

        public ScenarioMarketDataResult buildScenarioMarketData(MarketDataRequirements requirements,
                                                        BaseMarketData suppliedData,
                                                        ScenarioDefinition scenarioDefinition,
                                                        MarketDataConfig marketDataConfig)
        Description copied from interface: MarketDataFactory
        Builds the market data required for performing calculations over a portfolio for a set of scenarios.

        If the calculations require any data not provided in the suppliedData it is built by the engine before applying the scenario definition.

        If the scenario definition contains perturbations that apply to the inputs used to build market data, the data must be built by this method, not provided in suppliedData.

        For example, if a perturbation is defined that shocks the market quotes used to build a curve, the curve must not be provided in suppliedData. The engine will only build the curve using the market quotes if it is not found in suppliedData.

        Specified by:
        buildScenarioMarketData in interface MarketDataFactory
        Parameters:
        requirements - the market data required for the calculations
        suppliedData - the base market data used to derive the data for each scenario
        scenarioDefinition - defines how the market data for each scenario is derived from the base data
        marketDataConfig - configuration needed to build non-observable market data, for example curves or surfaces
        Returns:
        the market data required by the calculations
